> [{quoted}](name=shinytr33cko,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=MVAVqXEH,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2017-09-26T20:10:09.677+0000)
>
> Same thing with me lol. Someone from riot pls tell us what we're gonna get if we own all the ultimate skins.

I think that you get a special unlocked Hextech Chest with all four Skin Permanents within, so you could just disenchant them for Cosmetic Essence. I know last year's Pick'Em reward was three Ultimate Skins from a Hextech Chest so I don't see why it would be any different.
I'm just missing Udyr, but I don't play him a bit so don't really care xD {{sticker:sg-poppy}}

> [{quoted}](name=ShadowStar91,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=MVAVqXEH,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-09-26T15:45:41.639+0000)
>

I'm relatively sure that you get a special unlocked Hextech Chest with all four Skin Permanents within, so you could just disenchant them for Cosmetic Essence.
I don't have a real excuse to use a Star Guardian sticker... I just want to be a part of the club {{sticker:sg-poppy}}
same {{sticker:sg-lulu}}
{{sticker:sg-jinx}} Yuuki...?

Really surprised that these "Ultimate Skins" are the reward for predicting every single pick and team right in Worlds 2017, when last year only 1 person had the full tournament right.  Just seems like a throw away reward, when it's such a low possibility of that many winners to begin with. 
 With LCS/League/Riot going into this franchising in the near future, I'm really puzzled that they still haven't created "LCS only skins" for champions, that fans/players can only earn if they know their LCS/Competitive league.  It makes people watch the competitive product, to be able to get the skins that they would only get if they do so.  
  It would make people on youtube/streams care about the competitive scene, in which would in ways, increase fans to the scene, if the popular streamers would create videos of maybe analysis/stats/theories etc of such pro games.  
  ........... I went too far with this didn't I ?   Meh, just my thought on the matter, like always, I'll get downvoted.
Just here for the Poro Icons c': {{sticker:sg-jinx}}
So what happens if I own all Ultimate skins already? Do we just get 4 mystery gifts?  {{sticker:sg-syndra}}
No you get the shards and can convert them to essence.

> [{quoted}](name=darkcastkiller,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=MVAVqXEH,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-09-26T15:11:28.482+0000)
>
> No you get the shards and can convert them to essence.

Keep in mind that these are Permanents, not Shards, so they'll be worth a lot more.

I'd rather have all the Hextech skins over all the Ultimate Skins. They're much more ultimate. At least the price.

I mean, it's like a $120 reward for something you can participate in for free and easily.. so..
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

Hmm no?  Ultimate skins are 3250RP which is roughly $22 each, so that's $88 at most.  They are also, well, skins you can buy in store.  At least beforehand, it was Championship Riven (2012 edition), so that wasn't in store and was more special (in a sense).  They should really have just something that's exclusive to this kind of thing that way it would really feel more rewarding for people to try and get it.

As if you haven't read most of the comments, most people already own them.
